name: Cloudyn
overview:
Cloudyn is a leading innovator of intelligent technologies for dynamically cost-optimizing the way companies use cloud computing resources. Cloudyn’s right-sizing solution automatically gives companies new insight into their cloud infrastructure and recommends informed decisions on how to perfect their cloud investments, reducing costs while maintaining operational performance.

Cloudyn provides a non-intrusive SaaS-based solution that can be activated and running in minutes. Within a week, IT managers and CIOs receive a thorough analysis of their cloud environment, along with recommendations on how to save money and reduce management overhead by optimizing their cloud resource utilization. Cloudyn web-analytics lets organizations right-size their cloud investments with no risk and no intrusion.

Already actively managing tens of thousands of AWS resources today, Cloudyn delivers an average of 40% cloud-related cost reductions to organizations with significant cloud investments in various industries worldwide.

Cloudyn’s team of software veterans combine extensive experience in cloud computing and network optimization with a proven track record in transforming innovative ideas into viable and valuable products. VC-backed, the company is headquartered in Tel-Aviv.
